package.name: File_Passwd
package.summary: Manipulate many kinds of password files
package.description: Provides methods to manipulate standard Unix, SMB server, AuthUser (.htpasswd), AuthDigest (.htdigest) and CVS pserver password files.

release.notes:
The original class File_Passwd has been marked as deprecated. Use the new provided factory for instantiating your File_Passwd objects.
Added several classes for extended functionality. File_Passwd now provides a factory method for all 'special-purpose' classes. * &File_Passwd::factory('Unix') * &File_Passwd::factory('Cvs') * &File_Passwd::factory('Smb') * &File_Passwd::factory('AuthBasic') * &File_Passwd::factory('AuthDigest')
The old code will probably remain until 1.0-stable.
Added dependency: Crypt_CHAP.
Removed docs from package itself. Documentation is available at http://dev.iworks.at/PEAR/File_Passwd/ until peardoc documentation is generated.
